name: Jessica Lee
text: Great lunch buffet with stocked salad bar and pasta as well as pizza. Great food for the price. The manager was friendly and helpful. Highly recommended.

name: Joel Harvie
text: Although I have had issues at this Pizza Hut in the past, today's visit was just fine. this Pizza Hut is old and showing its age. The automatic door closer slams the front door closed when released. They have a note warning customers of …More

name: Marshall tron
text: We fell down and our pizza Fallon the ground. We where told by a man that we vid have our pizza remaid go no extra charge we are great dull for that and want the best for the kind man

name: Chris Prosser
text: Love it! This place is super cozy! Great people and great place. Super friendly!

name: Vangie
text: Ordered wings and salad bar, those wings were DISGUSTING! Will not go back! Gave it two stars because the waitress was good!

name: J Torres
text: I like this one it's always quiet and makes it very enjoyable.

name: Jenny Bergy
text: Hey Manager, don't ask me what you should do when you mess up an order. You should know what to do. Pizza was wrong, no ranch, no cheese, no red pepper or napkins as requested. Fix it is what you should do. Don't give me a guilt trip like …More

name: Randy Melton
text: Nice place to eat.  Server was very accommodating, and food was up to Pizza hut standards.

name: Emma the kind master
text: We came in at 1:24, and mom ordered a buffet. We did not get a buffet. The buffet included a salad bar, but there was no salad. There was not a good selection of pizza, and not a whole lot left. While we were eating, a guy came up to the …More

name: Sheila Seeley
text: We had a really good dinner. We ordered the Bacon Spinach Alfredo. Very good!

name: Lynzy Armeanic
text: Great costumer service! Super friendly staff! Good food!

name: Steven Robinson
text: When the wife called in to order, they said that they COULDN'T  hear her, when she did get the guy to hear her, then HE COULDN'T   Understand what her phone number was, she had to TELL him 4 or 5 times, before he got it RIGHT. OK, 15 …More

name: justin houser
text: I really wish that I had an option to leave no stars. Took over an hour to get our food. Called to see if the driver was lost and was hung up on by the front desk. My wife called back to speak with the manager on duty and he was rude …More

name: Ben the Warcraze
text: Crummy. Ordered stuffed crust. Forgot to add marinara. Called in to add it. They call me back: no stuffed crust. OK,  fine. It arrives no marinara either. Without marinara and stuffed crust, it's just crummy pizza.

name: John Vogt
text: Waited a good 10 minutes for some one to sit us at a table. Think they only had 2 employees for a Saturday night. Ended up leaving.

name: Bill Brown
text: Very friendly and professional also hard to find a place that understands what well done means without a bunch of questions extremely knowledgeable for being so young and it was yummy tasteie

name: Chris T
text: This is one of the dirtiest Pizza hut restaurants that I have ever seen. The pizza is good, but the dirty environment is overshadowing.

name: Gary Clark
text: I called in an hour beforehand to order carry out of a single pan pizza. I showed up 20 minutes after the time I said I would come and still had to wait 10 minutes to get the pizza. The establishment is very dirty. Go to Dominoes or even Little Caesar's over this Pizza Hut!

name: Janice Pariza
text: I could count no more than two to three ingredients on each piece.  Ridiculous. A good two inches down on the crust, barely any sauce.  I assume corporate has items weighed.  Reason I no longer eat at Subway.

name: Jim Carter
text: Good all you can eat Buffett $6.95

name: Calley Valenzuela
text: Pretty upset with our local Pizza Hut. My daughter got a  Book It reading reward but she is gluten free. Called Pizza Hut about the substitution options as stated on the coupon and they refused. Didn't even offer a discount on a regular GF …More

name: Mark Howard
text: Great service..wonderful pizza and nice manager

name: Denise Dion
text: Waited for 50 min and still no food was brought to our table. We gave our order as soon as we sat down. Horrible. We walked out without being served. Did I mention we were the only people in the restaurant?

name: Inibrasium the first
text: Awful customer service. The guy was really rude and upset that I walked into order instead of the internet. Went to their website and it wouldn't even pull up their store. Go here if you want your time wasted

name: Wes Devine
text: Small place with good pizzas and delivery.

name: Jason Fleetwood
text: Yummy salad bar for lunch and all you can eat pizza !!!

name: Jason Young
text: Still the worst managed resturant I've ever be to!  I feel incompetence is preferred by the owners.  Whatever makes them money.

name: Anilu Anilu
text: Good pizza. Good service.

name: Eric Gross
text: The new butter garlic sauce for crust is amazing!

name: Jason Hawks
text: Great pizza and good service

name: tom dick
text: Walked in at 9:00pm on Tuesday evening and stood there for 15 minutes and we could see and hear employees complaining about their jobs, one employee was on the phone.  They all saw us come in and we were never acknowledged or helped.  We finally left....

text: Buffet is a great option and fairly inexpensive.

name: Mica N.

text: I called to order, the girl on the  phone asked my name and address and before anything else she told me that they can not deliver to my address, they did delivery to me before, no good attitude to help costumers, is not my first negative experience, they mess up my orders 3 times in the past, piece crap workers.

text: Spelt "daily" "daylie" *triggered* and very CONCERNED
